name: Videopixie
headline: Marketplace for Video Production Services.  We help you hire the bestâ¦
description:
Videopixie is a marketplace for video production that allows users to have great video on the website, such as promotional videos and etc.

Videopixie is a marketplace where you can hire the worldâs best video professionals at a range of price points, to fit any budget. Retailers use Videopixie to make weekly product videos. Game companies use Videopixie to make trailers, using in-game footage, to air on national TV. Newly-weds use Videopixie to edit their five hours of âbig-dayâ footage into a five minute keepsake for life.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[![Videopixie](http://videopixie.com/st/images/logo_text_and_pixie.png)](http://videopixie.com/</>) [1 (800) 510-6570](http://videopixie.com/<tel:1 800 510 6570>) [Sign in](http://videopixie.com/</sign-in>) [Pricing](http://videopixie.com/</pricing>) [Video School](http://videopixie.com/</video-school>) [Videographers](http://videopixie.com/</videographers>) | [Animators](http://videopixie.com/</video-animators>) | [Browse: Video editors](http://videopixie.com/</video-editors>)
stop it moving!
## NEED VIDEO PRODUCTION?
# Find videographers, directors, video editors, and animators ready to create your video.
[Get Started!](http://videopixie.com/</start>)
### Describe the videoyou have in mind
Set up a project in 5 minutes,we can help you brainstorm
### Video professionals bid on your project
There are 1000s of professionals on videopixie, to fit all budgets
### You select yourfavorite bid
Choose based on portfolio,talent and production cost
#### Trusted by
## Video production examples
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Kickstarter Video
Font Awesome raised over $1M+ on Kickstarter! becoming the most backed software campaign of all time. They used Videopixie to find the perfect [video production company: Knox Avenue](http://videopixie.com/</creator/knoxavenue>)
$20000
[Start a crowdfunding video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=KICKSTARTER>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Game Trailer
[Animator Andriy Zvir](http://videopixie.com/</creator/AndyZvir>) created this upbeat trailer for Legends TD, Babeltime's cool new tower defense game. A balanced mix of 2D animated cut-scenes and enhanced gameplay. 
$1500
[Start a Game Trailer](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=SCREENCAST>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Indiegogo Video
[Video studio Hunt House Pictures](http://videopixie.com/</creator/hunthousepictures>) beautifully filmed Zboard's product and edited the flow in this crowdfunding video for Zboard's second Indiegogo campaign. It raised over $800k!. 
$6000
[Start a crowdfunding video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=KICKSTARTER>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Pitch Video
[Videographer Hard Road Pictures](http://videopixie.com/</creator/hardroadpictures>) collaborated with [video editor Alexander Thomas Media Co](http://videopixie.com/</creator/alexanderthomas>) to produce this powerful ad for IGP Energy to use with their investors. 
$8200
[Start a pitch video](http://videopixie.com/</start>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Product Video
Apache Pine Headphones filmed their own beautiful footage and needed a [video editor](http://videopixie.com/</video-editors>) to bring it all together. [Video editor Christopher Hutchinson](http://videopixie.com/</creator/christopherhutchinson>) delivered. 
$375 edit
[Start a product video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=PRODUCT>)
see more examples
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Animated Explainer Video
[Animators Lunamik](http://videopixie.com/</creator/epidemic>) created this high quality motion graphics for Patient Bank's animated explainer video, to keep their audience watching to the end. 
$6000
[Start an animated explainer](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=EXPLAINER>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Screencast Explainer
[Animator Hoju Kim](http://videopixie.com/</creator/hoju>) created this engaging explainer video for Townsquare by weaving screencast video with typography. 
$1900
[Start a screencast video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=SCREENCAST>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Kickstarter Video
For their kickstarter video, Flamestower wanted to connect with nature lovers. [Video studio Rebel Unit Media](http://videopixie.com/</creator/rebelunitmedia>) filmed beautiful locations and set the perfect mood. 
$10000
[Start a crowdfunding video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=KICKSTARTER>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Explainer Video
[Videographer Alexander Thomas Media Co](http://videopixie.com/</creator/alexanderthomas>) used stock footage and subtle animation to bring this explainer video to life for MedicX. 
$3850
[Start an explainer video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=EXPLAINER>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Wedding Video
[Wedding videographer IQ Videography](http://videopixie.com/</creator/iqvideography>) captured this special day with masterful cinematography and storytelling for Lista and Jonas at the Annadel State Winery. 
$6000
[Start a wedding video](http://videopixie.com/</start?preset_type=WEDDING>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Background Video
[Videographer Ioana Vasile](http://videopixie.com/</creator/ioanavasile>) collaborated with [video editor Eddie DaRoza](http://videopixie.com/</creator/one40media>) to create this custom background video for Heyzap's homepage 
$1000
[Start a background video](http://videopixie.com/</start>)
![play button](http://videopixie.com/st/images/play_outline.png)
### Fitness Video
[Videographer Ioana Vasile](http://videopixie.com/</creator/ioanavasile>) produced 10 fitness videos for XHIT to showcase their new workout series. All for a budget of $1500. 
$1500 for 10 episodes
[Start a fitness video](http://videopixie.com/</start>)
## Thousands of Editors, AnimatorsVideographers & Directors
Use Videopixie to find an individual video freelancer, a lean 2-3 person team, or ahigh-end video production studio.
[ mograph artist Dave Chenell  New York, New York motion graphics,illustration ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/davechenell>) [ colorist Ben Goalabre Paris, France & Santa Barbara, CA directing, editing, color grading ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/benjamingoalabre>) [ mograph studio RocketWheel  San Francisco, CA animation studio ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/rocketwheel>) [ director Alexander ThomasMedia Co Sydney, Australia  producing, filming, editing ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/alexanderthomas>) [ animator Hoju Kim Brooklyn, NY animation ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/hoju>) [ editor Matias Canelson  Miami, Florida color grading,editing ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/matiascanelson>) [ director of photography Ioana Vasile Los Angeles, CA directing, filming ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/ioanavasile>) [ cinematographer Ian Cook New Orleans, LO directing, filming, editing ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/hardroadpictures>) [ editor ThereseAnne Hong Kong editing ](http://videopixie.com/</creator/thereseanne>)
[Browse top video studios](http://videopixie.com/<video-production>)
### Or find specific video skills:
[Video editors for hire](http://videopixie.com/</video-editors>) [Video animators for hire](http://videopixie.com/</video-animators>) [Videographers for hire](http://videopixie.com/</videographers>)
[Sign up as a creator](http://videopixie.com/</im_a_pro>) I make video...
## Learn about video production
[Crowdfunding Video Benchmark](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/blog/crowdfunding-video-cost-benchmark-what-works-how-much-to-spend>) [Best Kickstarter and Indiegogo videos](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/best-kickstarter-videos-of-2015>) [Best startup videos of all time](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/best-startup-videos-of-all-time>) [How much does a crowdfunding video cost](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/how-much-does-a-kickstarter-video-cost>)
[Amazing explainer videos](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/best-explainer-videos-of-2015>) [How to make a game trailer](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/make-a-game-trailer>) [How to find amazing wedding video editors](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/wedding-video-post-production>) [7 tips for online course videos](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/tips-for-shooting-udemy-courses>) [More...](http://videopixie.com/<https:/www.videopixie.com/video-school>)
## Posting a project takes5 minutes, and it's free!
Start a project by answering a few simple questions, then post it! You'll receive 5-10 bids from pre-selected videographers, editors, animators and directors in our community.
![pixie head](http://videopixie.com/st/images/pixie_face_247x277.png) [Start a Project Now](http://videopixie.com/</start>)
## Read about us in the press
[ ![logo_techcrunch](http://videopixie.com/st/images/logo_techcrunch.png) ](http://videopixie.com/<http:/techcrunch.com/2015/05/18/videopixie-a-video-production-startup-that-connects-buyers-and-creators-raises-1-1m/>) [ ![logo_nofilmschool](http://videopixie.com/st/images/logo_nofilmschool.png) ](http://videopixie.com/<http:/nofilmschool.com/2013/06/videopixie-viedit-freelance-editor-marketplace/>) [ ![logo_videofilmmaker](http://videopixie.com/st/images/logo_videofilmmaker.png) ](http://videopixie.com/<http:/videoandfilmmaker.com/wp/index.php/news/freelance-editing-videopixie/>)
![videopixie logo](http://videopixie.com/st/images/logo_text_and_pixie.png)

generated_description:
**Videopixie: Your Marketplace for Video Production**

Videopixie is fundamentally reshaping how people approach video production. Founded in the vibrant city of San Francisco and nurtured through Y Combinator’s Batch S11, this platform serves as a marketplace connecting clients with the world's best video professionals—whether you’re on a shoestring budget or seeking high-end production.

The core mission of Videopixie revolves around helping users hire the finest video talent to create stunning content like promotional videos, wedding montages, gaming trailers, and Kickstarter campaigns. With a diverse array of creators—ranging from talented freelancers to full-scale production studios—Videopixie tailors to every project's unique needs.

### **What Videopixie Offers**

1. **Streamlined Process:** It takes only five minutes to set up a project on the site. Describe what you need, and you'll receive bids from qualified videographers, animators, and editors. Choose your favorite based on their portfolios and production costs.

2. **Versatile Applications:** From weekly product videos for retailers to heartfelt wedding edits, Videopixie's professionals can handle it all. Companies like Knox Avenue and Hunt House Pictures have found success leveraging Videopixie to create impactful visuals that resonate.

3. **Thousands of Options:** Whether you're looking for individual freelancers or a full-fledged production team, the platform boasts a vast network of experts in various video production specialties.

### **Team and Impact**

With a dedicated team of 11 vibrant employees, Videopixie is thriving in the competitive video production landscape. The company encourages creativity and innovation in video services, making it a go-to destination for those needing compelling visual content.

### **Get Involved**

If you’re looking to start a video project or even get involved as a creator, check out their offerings at [Videopixie.com](http://videopixie.com).

In a nutshell, Videopixie is not just another service; it’s where creativity meets convenience in video production. Whether you need a simple edit or a complex animation, this platform ensures you’ll find the right match for your vision.
